code:
var log = require('loglevel');
var respoke = require('./respoke');

tags.name: params.element
tags.description: - Pass in an optional html video element to have local video attached to it.

description.full: A wrapper around the stream from getUserMedia, which is attached to a call at call.outgoingMedia.
description.summary: A wrapper around the stream from getUserMedia, which is attached to a call at call.outgoingMedia.

code: that.className = 'respoke.LocalMedia';
that.id = respoke.makeGUID();
var client = respoke.getClient(instanceId);
that.element = params.element;
var sdpHasAudio = false;
var sdpHasVideo = false;
var sdpHasDataChannel = false;

description.full: A timer to make sure we only fire {respoke.LocalMedia#requesting-media} if the browser doesn't automatically grant permission on behalf of the user. Timer is canceled in onReceiveUserMedia.
description.summary: A timer to make sure we only fire {respoke.LocalMedia#requesting-media} if the browser doesn't automatically grant permission on behalf of the user. Timer is canceled in onReceiveUserMedia.

code: var allowTimer = 0;

var pc = params.pc;
    delete that.pc;

description.full: Save the local stream. Kick off SDP creation.
description.summary: Save the local stream. Kick off SDP creation.

description.full: The user has approved the request for media. Any UI changes made to remind the user to click Allow should be canceled now. This event is the same as the onAllow callback. This event gets fired even if the allow process is automatic, i. e., permission and media is granted by the browser without asking the user to approve it.
description.summary: The user has approved the request for media. Any UI changes made to remind the user to click Allow should be canceled now. This event is the same as the onAllow callback. This event gets fired even if the allow process is automatic, i. e., permission and media is granted by the browser without asking the user to approve it.

code: that.getAudioTracks = that.stream.getAudioTracks.bind(that.stream);

tags.name: element
tags.description: - the HTML5 Video element with the new stream attached.

tags.name: element
tags.description: - the HTML5 Video element with the new stream attached.

description.full: Create the RTCPeerConnection and add handlers. Process any offer we have already received.
description.summary: Create the RTCPeerConnection and add handlers. Process any offer we have already received.

description.full: The browser is asking for permission to access the User's media. This would be an ideal time to modify the UI of the application so that the user notices the request for permissions and approves it.
description.summary: The browser is asking for permission to access the User's media. This would be an ideal time to modify the UI of the application so that the user notices the request for permissions and approves it.

description.full: Handle any error that comes up during the process of getting user media.
description.summary: Handle any error that comes up during the process of getting user media.

description.full: Indicate there has been an error obtaining media.
description.summary: Indicate there has been an error obtaining media.

description.full: Indicate there has been an error obtaining media.
description.summary: Indicate there has been an error obtaining media.

description.full:
Whether the video stream is muted.

All video tracks must be muted for this to return false.
description.body: All video tracks must be muted for this to return false.

tags.name: type
tags.description:
- Either "audio" or "video" to specify the type of stream whose muted state
has been changed.

tags.name: muted
tags.description: - Whether the stream is now muted. Will be set to false if mute was turned off.

tags.name: type
tags.description:
- Either "audio" or "video" to specify the type of stream whose muted state
has been changed.

tags.name: muted
tags.description: - Whether the stream is now muted. Will be set to false if mute was turned off.

description.full:
Whether the audio stream is muted.

All audio tracks must be muted for this to return false.
description.body: All audio tracks must be muted for this to return false.

tags.name: type
tags.description:
- Either "audio" or "video" to specify the type of stream whose muted state
has been changed.

tags.name: muted
tags.description: - Whether the stream is now muted. Will be set to false if mute was turned off.
